channel.title: Victor Zhang | Full Stack & Mobile Engineer | From Idea to App Store
channel.description: Full Stack and Mobile Engineer specializing in SwiftUI, React Native, React, and Node.js. Creating exceptional digital experiences.

item.title: Choosing the Right JavaScript Data Visualization Framework: Insights and Comparisons
item.description: A comprehensive guide comparing popular JavaScript data visualization frameworks to help you choose the right tool for your project

item.title: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG): The Power of Hybrid Search
item.description: An in-depth exploration of RAG, comparing vector and keyword retrieval, understanding hybrid search strategies, and why RAG is essential for modern LLM applications.

item.title: Board Game AI Development: From Minimax to Modern Deep Learning
item.description: Exploring the evolution of artificial intelligence in board games, from classical algorithms to modern machine learning approaches

item.title: Essential React State Management: Common Pitfalls and Best Practices
item.description: Learn critical React state management patterns and avoid common mistakes that lead to bugs and performance issues

item.title: Vibe Coding with Git Worktrees: A Playbook Most Devs Are Missing
item.description: Most people vibe-code with one model in one branch. Here is how to use multiple models, git worktrees, and a phased workflow to ship refactors without breaking everything.
